queries.natural_language: Show me the financial performance of Mashreq bank for 2020
variations: Display financial data for Mashreq in year 2020
How did Mashreq perform financially in 2020
queries.sql_query: SELECT fp.* FROM FINANCIAL_PERFORMANCE fp JOIN BANKS b ON fp.BANK_ID = b.BANK_ID WHERE b.BANK_NAME = 'Mashreq' AND fp.YEAR = 2020 ORDER BY fp.QUARTER

queries.natural_language: Which banks have the highest NPL ratio in Q4 2020
variations: Find banks with highest non-performing loans in Q4 2020
Show banks with worst NPL ratio in fourth quarter 2020
Banks with high bad loans Q4 2020
Top banks by NPL ratio Q4 2020
queries.sql_query: SELECT b.BANK_NAME, fp.NPL_RATIO FROM FINANCIAL_PERFORMANCE fp JOIN BANKS b ON fp.BANK_ID = b.BANK_ID WHERE fp.YEAR = 2020 AND fp.QUARTER = 4 ORDER BY fp.NPL_RATIO DESC

queries.natural_language: Compare market capitalization of all banks in 2020
variations: Show market cap comparison for all banks in 2020
What's the market value of each bank in 2020
queries.sql_query: SELECT b.BANK_NAME, AVG(md.MARKET_CAP_USD_BN) as AVG_MARKET_CAP_USD FROM MARKET_DATA md JOIN BANKS b ON md.BANK_ID = b.BANK_ID WHERE md.YEAR = 2020 GROUP BY b.BANK_NAME, b.BANK_ID ORDER BY AVG_MARKET_CAP_USD DESC

queries.natural_language: Show banks with CET1 ratio above 14%
variations: Which banks have CET1 ratio greater than 14
Banks with strong capital adequacy above 14%
queries.sql_query: SELECT DISTINCT b.BANK_NAME, md.CET1 FROM MARKET_DATA md JOIN BANKS b ON md.BANK_ID = b.BANK_ID WHERE md.CET1 > 14 ORDER BY md.CET1 DESC

queries.natural_language: What is the average deposit growth for all banks
variations: Calculate average deposit increase across banks
Show mean deposit growth all banks
Average deposits trend for banking sector
queries.sql_query: SELECT AVG((q4.DEPOSITS - q1.DEPOSITS) / q1.DEPOSITS * 100) as AVG_DEPOSIT_GROWTH FROM FINANCIAL_PERFORMANCE q1 JOIN FINANCIAL_PERFORMANCE q4 ON q1.BANK_ID = q4.BANK_ID AND q1.YEAR = q4.YEAR WHERE q1.QUARTER = 1 AND q4.QUARTER = 4

queries.natural_language: Show quarterly profit trends for ADCB bank
queries.sql_query: SELECT fp.YEAR, fp.QUARTER, fp.QUARTERLY_PROFIT FROM FINANCIAL_PERFORMANCE fp JOIN BANKS b ON fp.BANK_ID = b.BANK_ID WHERE b.BANK_NAME = 'ADCB' ORDER BY fp.YEAR, fp.QUARTER

queries.natural_language: Which bank has the best cost-to-income ratio
variations: Find most efficient bank by cost income ratio
Bank with lowest cost to income
queries.sql_query: SELECT b.BANK_NAME, MIN(fp.COST_INCOME) as BEST_RATIO FROM FINANCIAL_PERFORMANCE fp JOIN BANKS b ON fp.BANK_ID = b.BANK_ID GROUP BY b.BANK_NAME ORDER BY BEST_RATIO LIMIT 1

queries.natural_language: Show all banks headquartered in Dubai
queries.sql_query: SELECT BANK_NAME, BANK_CODE FROM BANKS WHERE HEADQUARTERS = 'Dubai'

queries.natural_language: Calculate total loans for all banks in Q2 2021
variations: Sum of loans Q2 2021 all banks
queries.sql_query: SELECT SUM(LOANS_ADVANCES) as TOTAL_LOANS FROM FINANCIAL_PERFORMANCE WHERE YEAR = 2021 AND QUARTER = 2

queries.natural_language: Show banks with improving NIM over 2020
variations: Banks with increasing net interest margin 2020
queries.sql_query: SELECT b.BANK_NAME, q1.NIM as Q1_NIM, q4.NIM as Q4_NIM, (q4.NIM - q1.NIM) as NIM_CHANGE FROM FINANCIAL_PERFORMANCE q1 JOIN FINANCIAL_PERFORMANCE q4 ON q1.BANK_ID = q4.BANK_ID JOIN BANKS b ON b.BANK_ID = q1.BANK_ID WHERE q1.YEAR = 2020 AND q1.QUARTER = 1 AND q4.YEAR = 2020 AND q4.QUARTER = 4 AND q4.NIM > q1.NIM

queries.natural_language: What is the CASA ratio for DIB bank
variations: DIB current and savings account ratio
queries.sql_query: SELECT fp.YEAR, fp.QUARTER, fp.CASA, fp.DEPOSITS, (fp.CASA / fp.DEPOSITS * 100) as CASA_RATIO FROM FINANCIAL_PERFORMANCE fp JOIN BANKS b ON fp.BANK_ID = b.BANK_ID WHERE b.BANK_NAME = 'DIB' ORDER BY fp.YEAR DESC, fp.QUARTER DESC

queries.natural_language: Compare share prices of all banks in Q3 2022
queries.sql_query: SELECT b.BANK_NAME, md.SHARE_PRICE FROM MARKET_DATA md JOIN BANKS b ON md.BANK_ID = b.BANK_ID WHERE md.YEAR = 2022 AND md.QUARTER = 3 ORDER BY md.SHARE_PRICE DESC

queries.natural_language: Show banks with PE ratio below 10
queries.sql_query: SELECT DISTINCT b.BANK_NAME, md.PE_RATIO FROM MARKET_DATA md JOIN BANKS b ON md.BANK_ID = b.BANK_ID WHERE md.PE_RATIO < 10 ORDER BY md.PE_RATIO

queries.natural_language: Calculate average ROE for banking sector
variations: Mean return on equity all banks
What's the average ROTE for banks
queries.sql_query: SELECT AVG(ROTE) as AVG_RETURN_ON_EQUITY FROM FINANCIAL_PERFORMANCE WHERE YEAR = 2023

queries.natural_language: Show risk-weighted assets for FAB bank
variations: First Abu Dhabi Bank risk weighted assets
queries.sql_query: SELECT md.YEAR, md.QUARTER, md.RWA FROM MARKET_DATA md JOIN BANKS b ON md.BANK_ID = b.BANK_ID WHERE b.BANK_NAME = 'FAB' ORDER BY md.YEAR, md.QUARTER

queries.natural_language: Which bank has highest market cap in USD
variations: Largest bank by market capitalization USD
Top bank market value in dollars
Biggest bank by market cap USD
queries.sql_query: SELECT b.BANK_NAME, MAX(md.MARKET_CAP_USD_BN) as MAX_MARKET_CAP FROM MARKET_DATA md JOIN BANKS b ON md.BANK_ID = b.BANK_ID GROUP BY b.BANK_NAME ORDER BY MAX_MARKET_CAP DESC LIMIT 1

queries.natural_language: Show quarterly income trends for all banks
variations: Income progression by quarter all banks
queries.sql_query: SELECT b.BANK_NAME, fp.YEAR, fp.QUARTER, fp.YTD_INCOME FROM FINANCIAL_PERFORMANCE fp JOIN BANKS b ON fp.BANK_ID = b.BANK_ID ORDER BY b.BANK_NAME, fp.YEAR, fp.QUARTER

queries.natural_language: Find banks with cost of risk above 1.5
variations: Which banks have cost of risk over 1.5
queries.sql_query: SELECT DISTINCT b.BANK_NAME, fp.COR FROM FINANCIAL_PERFORMANCE fp JOIN BANKS b ON fp.BANK_ID = b.BANK_ID WHERE fp.COR > 1.5 ORDER BY fp.COR DESC

queries.natural_language: Show Stage 3 coverage ratios for 2023
queries.sql_query: SELECT b.BANK_NAME, fp.QUARTER, fp.STAGE3_COVER FROM FINANCIAL_PERFORMANCE fp JOIN BANKS b ON fp.BANK_ID = b.BANK_ID WHERE fp.YEAR = 2023 ORDER BY b.BANK_NAME, fp.QUARTER

queries.natural_language: Compare PB ratios across all banks
queries.sql_query: SELECT b.BANK_NAME, AVG(md.PB_RATIO) as AVG_PB_RATIO FROM MARKET_DATA md JOIN BANKS b ON md.BANK_ID = b.BANK_ID GROUP BY b.BANK_NAME ORDER BY AVG_PB_RATIO DESC

queries.natural_language: Show me all banks with their market cap
queries.sql_query:
SELECT B.BANK_ID, B.BANK_NAME, M.MARKET_CAP_AED_BN, M.MARKET_CAP_USD_BN
FROM BANKS B
JOIN MARKET_DATA M ON B.BANK_ID = M.BANK_ID
GROUP BY B.BANK_ID, B.BANK_NAME, M.MARKET_CAP_AED_BN, M.MARKET_CAP_USD_BN;

queries.natural_language: What is the average NPL ratio for banks in Q4 2020?
Get financial performance of Mashreq bank
queries.sql_query:
SELECT 
    b.BANK_NAME,
    b.BANK_CODE,
    b.ESTABLISHED_DATE,
    b.HEADQUARTERS,
    f.YEAR,
    f.QUARTER,
    f.YTD_INCOME,
    f.YTD_PROFIT,
    f.QUARTERLY_PROFIT,
    f.LOANS_ADVANCES,
    f.NIM,
    f.DEPOSITS,
    f.CASA,
    f.COST_INCOME,
    f.NPL_RATIO,
    f.COR,
    f.STAGE3_COVER,
    f.ROTE,
    m.CET1,
    m.CET_CAPITAL,
    m.RWA,
    m.SHARE_PRICE,
    m.MARKET_CAP_AED_BN,
    m.MARKET_CAP_USD_BN,
    m.PE_RATIO,
    m.PB_RATIO
FROM 
    BANKS b
JOIN 
    FINANCIAL_PERFORMANCE f ON b.BANK_ID = f.BANK_ID
JOIN 
    MARKET_DATA m ON b.BANK_ID = m.BANK_ID
WHERE 
    b.BANK_NAME = 'Mashreq'
ORDER BY 
    f.YEAR, f.QUARTER;

queries.natural_language: Which bank has the highest deposits?
queries.sql_query:
SELECT B.BANK_NAME, SUM(F.DEPOSITS) AS TOTAL_DEPOSITS
FROM BANKS B
JOIN FINANCIAL_PERFORMANCE F ON B.BANK_ID = F.BANK_ID
GROUP BY B.BANK_NAME
ORDER BY TOTAL_DEPOSITS DESC
FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY;

queries.natural_language: Show banks with CET1 ratio above 14%
queries.sql_query:
SELECT B.BANK_ID, B.BANK_NAME, M.CET1
FROM BANKS B
JOIN MARKET_DATA M ON B.BANK_ID = M.BANK_ID
WHERE M.CET1 > 14;

queries.natural_language: Show weather data
queries.sql_query: SELECT * FROM WEATHER_DATA;

queries.natural_language: Find restaurants with high ratings
queries.sql_query:
SELECT RESTAURANT_NAME, RATING 
FROM RESTAURANTS 
WHERE RATING >= 4.0 
ORDER BY RATING DESC;

queries.natural_language: Show vehicle information
queries.sql_query:
SELECT VEHICLE_ID, MAKE, MODEL, YEAR, LICENSE_PLATE 
FROM VEHICLES;

queries.natural_language: Show all banks
queries.sql_query: SELECT * FROM BANKS;

queries.natural_language: Which banks have NPL ratio above 4%?
queries.sql_query:
SELECT B.BANK_NAME 
FROM BANKS B 
JOIN FINANCIAL_PERFORMANCE FP ON B.BANK_ID = FP.BANK_ID 
WHERE FP.NPL_RATIO > 4;

queries.natural_language: Get market capitalization for all banks
